description:
My place is close to Brooklyn Bridge, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Dumbo, Vinegar Hill, Manhattan, Downtown Brooklyn, BAM, parks, restaurants, shopping M. You’ll love my place because of My place is spacious with high ceilings, lots of light, contemporary, safe, new constructions, well appointed, clean, comfortable , the views, the location, the ambiance.

You can access the entire apartment, the buildings amenities which include, coffee lounge, gym, game room, and beautiful landscaped rooftop.

There will be a contact to help you if needed

There are several subway stops within a 5 min walk. You can easily walk across both the Brooklyn Bridge and Manhattan Bridge as well. Taxis are also readily available.

Please do not touch, move or remove the art or books.
name: Luxury and  Contemporary
